column1: Georgetown College is a private liberal arts college located in the downtown area of Georgetown. Baptist Seminary of Kentucky is a seminary in Georgetown.
Public education in Georgetown and Scott County consists of a preschool center serving special needs and economically at-risk students aged 3–5

column3: three middle schools (grades 6–8) and two high schools (grades 9–12). These schools are all part of the Scott County Schools system.
